channel.title: Runescape membership prices up by $2
channel.description:
It was eminent with all the loss they had from removing bots. my question is does it mean that If you have an account that has ever been a member than it will continue to have the current price of $5.95? b/c I have 1 account that has had membership for over a year a couple years ago. and another that has been a member probably 4 months b4. both currently arent a member since i dont play enough. so on those accounts will it only cost $5.95?
From my understanding of what they wrote this is correct. I just dont want to pay more than i have to.

item.title: Runescape membership prices up by $2
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I love how on bot nuke day all of the legit players thought it was something they were working on for at least a year without even knowing what the fuck they did, how they did it, or how the client works.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape membership prices up by $2
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:19, topic:430427”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=533111.msg3897218#msg3897218 date=1327423645]
Not sure what’s going on, but I just paid $5.95 for membership. Am I missing something? They rose it by $1 for credit card users, and something like $2 for paypal users.
[/quote]
They are going to raise it on the first of the month for new users, but if you have ever had a subscription on an account your signing up on it will only cost the original like 5.95 or something like that.[/quote]

It has to be continually recurring from before the price raise. If you let it slip up then you pay the new price. I still pay $4.95 from a few years ago, so lets hope I never slip

Woops they allow a 7 day grace period if you do slip

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape membership prices up by $2
item.dc:creator: @moomanchoo moomanchoo
item.description:
@moomanchoo wrote:

Um the actual price for US citizens is 5.95 up until February then it will be 7.95 I remember very clear that the price has been 5.95 for quite sometime but original price was 5$ until they wanted more money which increased it to 5.95 now they want more money so they are raising the prices yet again to 7.95.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape membership prices up by $2
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:26, topic:430427”]Anyone else think they’re going to turn the game into a full p2p game?[/quote]highly doubtful there are several members who only pay for membership like once every other month. There are also several members who have “f2p pride”

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape membership prices up by $2
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

@xwrz, thanks for replying but its fine. I’m just going to get a bank account set up and pay by card.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape membership prices up by $2
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

maybe. they were supposed to be doing some more stuff for f2p which they have. f2p is like 1%(not the actually % it maybe a little higher but it seems like it; i would have to do a ton of research just to figure out the actual %) of what p2p can do… if they increased it to like 5% it would make it nicer. I have a lvl 90 main with lvl 60+ in most of my stats and lvling up skill as f2p just isnt any fun. I actually kinda appreciate them removing bots even though i was a botter(not on my main, may main is purely played by me; but all my noob accounts I botted on). the reason why is when I was wcing just for the heck of it it was kinda nice to be able to talk to actually ppl while you chopped yews. Does mopar have a thread about community f2p activities? I think that might make the game a little more fun if a couple of us f2p skilled, pvp in cw, or did dungeoneering together or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape membership prices up by $2
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Anyone else think they’re going to turn the game into a full p2p game?

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape membership prices up by $2
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

ya I was thinking about buying membership but most of the time I only get on half the days of the month and only play a couple hours when I do play do im thinking it wouldnt be a good for me to buy membership just to keep the $5.95. if they locked the price in for anyone that was a previous member i would buy a membership for one of my accounts but since that isnt the case it would be a waste of money for me. If they add some cool things I will look at buying a membership then but at the moment I still need to buy MC. also im not to happy with them taking the high scores away from f2p… that was absolutely unnecessary.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape membership prices up by $2
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

Taharok:

Ocrap. Big decisions to make then. I’ve been paying for membership for 3 months even though I haven’t been playing. That starts to add up over time, but stopping means an increase in payment. :X

DON’T STOP…(believin’)

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape membership prices up by $2
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Ocrap. Big decisions to make then. I’ve been paying for membership for 3 months even though I haven’t been playing. That starts to add up over time, but stopping means an increase in payment. :X

Edit:

The price you pay now will be locked in for as long as you stay a loyal member and we will even allow a seven day grace period should you forget to renew.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape membership prices up by $2
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:20, topic:430427”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=533111.msg3897223#msg3897223 date=1327424119]

Not sure what’s going on, but I just paid $5.95 for membership. Am I missing something? They rose it by $1 for credit card users, and something like $2 for paypal users.

They are going to raise it on the first of the month for new users, but if you have ever had a subscription on an account your signing up on it will only cost the original like 5.95 or something like that.
[/quote]that is true, however, if you stop paying for mem it raises after that.[/quote]

dang i just reread that and ya you only keep the $5.95 for as long as you stay a member…

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape membership prices up by $2
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

This is bad news for me… $7.95 = 11.45 BGN (That’s what you get for a whole day of working). Gotta be careful not to miss payment.

item.title: Runescape membership prices up by $2
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:11, topic:430427”][quote author=xryz link=topic=533111.msg3896808#msg3896808 date=1327371776]
the credit card info isn’t filled in. maybe It recognizes my pc with a cookie or something? which i doubt; ive bought membership on this computer but I believe it was on a previously installed OS.
[/quote]Maybe you’re just a lucky ducky.[/quote]
i guess

amy_webb:

I pay like 10 - 15 dollars for my rs membership, it’s because they hate me.

dang I’d pay for wow at that price.

Kidpaparoach:

So if you pay by Sms/Paypal whats the situation? Cause I don’t do reoccurring cause most of the time I just pay Rsgp for members. I know someone answered it but I don’t really understand what there saying.

paypal is the cheaper way. sms is a pretty high price. what do u mean by situation? all you have to do is cancel your membership within a day or so if you only plan on being a member for a month. its the cheapest option, so unless you can’t pay by credit card then there isnt a reason why not to take that option.

Read full topic
